trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that supports horizontal scrolling of tabs in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> fornece a rolagem horizontal por linha para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controles em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.

trans-unit.source: Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para rolagem para cima ou para baixo e a rolagem por página.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel" /> class.
The size that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel" /> needs to position its child elements.
Positions and sizes the child elements in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel" />.
The actual size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel" />.
Gets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the horizontal axis is possible.
<see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
<see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.

trans-unit.source: Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para rolagem para cima ou para baixo e a rolagem por página.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
0.0 in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 0,0 em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O tamanho horizontal do conteúdo rolados para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não tem valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: This property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A> value of the panel’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade contém o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A> interno do valor do painel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The horizontal offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento horizontal do conteúdo rolados para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não tem valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: This property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> value of the panel’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade contém o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> interno do valor do painel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> fornece a rolagem horizontal por linha para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controles em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.

trans-unit.source: Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para rolagem para cima ou para baixo e a rolagem por página.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content left by one line.
Scrolls the content right by one line.
This API is not implemented.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.

trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para rolagem para cima ou para baixo e a rolagem por página.

trans-unit.source: The object to make visible.
A bounding rectangle that identifies the coordinate space to make visible.
Forces content to scroll until the coordinate space of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> object is visible.
The rectangle that is visible.
The maximum size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel" />.

Measures the child elements in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel" /> in preparation of arranging them during the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> pass.
The desired size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel" />.
This API is not implemented.

trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> elemento que controla o comportamento de rolagem.

Sets the amount that content is horizontal offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The horizontal size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O tamanho horizontal visível do conteúdo intervalo de em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não tem valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: This property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A> value of the panel’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
